różnica największa: 8999 (lub 1000)

# zad 2
## 2.1
n | T[1..n] | x | T po wykonaniu d(x)
--|---------|---|--------------------
4 | 26, 3, 5, –4 | 5 | 26, 5, 5, –4, 3
4 | 36, 15, 17, 3 | –5 | **36, 15, 17, 3, -5**
7 | 27, 6, 13, 4, –3, –2, –3 | 30 | **30, 27, 13, 6, -3, -2, -3, 4**


## 2.2
odp: **27, 26, 8, -4, 12, 6**

proces:

1. {6}
2. {6, -4}
3. {6, -4, 12} -> {12, -4, 6}
4. {12, -4, 6, 27} -> {12, 27, 6, -4} -> {27, 12, 6, -4}
5. {27, 12, 6, -4, 26} -> {27, 26, 6, -4, 12}
6. {27, 26, 6, -4, 12, 8} -> {27, 26, 8, -4, 12, 6} -> koniec

## 2.3
k | ile razy sprawdzany jest warunek
--|---------------------------------
4 | 3
16 | **5**
1025 | **11**
